items.content_html: Web scraping extracts data from websites. In JavaScript, jsdom and Puppeteer are powerful tools for this task. jsdom is a lightweight DOM implementation that lets user manipulate and query static pages. Puppeteer is a Node.js library for controlling headless Chrome/Chromium, ideal for dynamic websites. It can simulate user interactions and take ss.
